hello!

Treawna here, a graphic designer (musician, nutritionist) and photographer based in Ottawa. I specialize in obsessing over fine details while calmly translating information into pleasing visual experiences! Specifically, my areas of focus are branding, web and UX/UI.

Physicians Formula

sustainable packaging / product photography

Eliminating single-use plastics with eco-friendly packaging design, one charcoal cleansing stick at a time.
